column5: With last nights thunder storm and this mornings general crapiness (nice now here in Mississauga though) I put up a post I had written a while agoÂ  - the rainy day shuffle Nothing can kill an outdoor trip like bad weather - post is just a few of things my family and trip groups have done over the years to "weather it out" https://www.northernjacks.com/post/the-rainy-day-shuffle?postId=5e19edd0a394bc0017c406a6 Cheers Andrew
